name: Lemon Pudding Cake
steps: Blend well first 3 ingredients. Add next 4 ingredients and mix until smooth. Mix in flour and cornstarch until smooth. Beat egg whites separately with salt to soft peaks. Fold carefully into batter.
Spray 6 4 oz. ramekins (small souffle dishes) with cooking spray and dust with sugar. Fill each and place all in a baking dish half filled with warm water.
Bake 30 min at 350. Chill. Invert on dessert plates to serve.
